first_para: Anthony Edward Timpson (born (1973-12-26)26 December 1973) is a British Conservative Party politician. He became a Member of Parliament (MP) in 2008 after winning a by-election in the constituency of Crewe and Nantwich. In September 2012, he was appointed as a Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State at the Department for Education.

full.extract:
Anthony Edward Timpson (born (1973-12-26)26 December 1973) is a British Conservative Party politician. He became a Member of Parliament (MP) in 2008 after winning a by-election in the constituency of Crewe and Nantwich. In September 2012, he was appointed as a Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State at the Department for Education.
^ http://www.edwardtimpson.com/text.aspx?id=11
full.title: Edward Timpson
